abstract: Ferguson, Mo, city manager John Shaw agrees to resign after being faulted in Justice Dept report for heading financially driven policies that resulted in much discrimination and questionable conduct by police and courts in city; had held post since 2007.
lead_paragraph: A federal report said the manager, John Shaw, was responsible for much of the questionable conduct by the police and the courts in Ferguson, Mo.

headline.main: Ferguson City Manager Cited in Justice Department Report Resigns
headline.print_headline: Official Quits Amid Blame in Ferguson

snippet: A federal report said the manager, John Shaw, was responsible for much of the questionable conduct by the police and the courts in Ferguson, Mo.
